org.numenta.nupic.examples.cortical_io.breakingnews

Class BreakingNewsDemo

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • org.numenta.nupic.examples.cortical_io.breakingnews.BreakingNewsDemo

  • public class BreakingNewsDemo
extends javafx.application.Application
    Demonstration of Cortical.io trend tracking functionality to analyze and display detection of new trends and the adherence of new tweets to the current detected trend.
